description: Try our easy to follow Avolution Avocado And Corn Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Corn,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Avolution Avocado And Corn Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup corn (fresh or thawed if frozen)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the corn, cherry tomatoes, red onion and coriander in a large bowl and toss to combine.
In a small bowl, whisk the lime juice, olive oil, coriander, ground pepper and salt.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for 30 minutes. Serve with fresh pita bread, tortilla chips or a side of rice.
